paramInformation.label: Remember device state
paramInformation.description: Determines how the device will react in the event of power supply failure

options.label: remains switched off after restoring power
restores remembered state after restoring power

paramInformation.label: Overload safety switch
paramInformation.description: Turn off the controlled device in case of exceeding the defined power

paramInformation.label: LED frame – power limit
paramInformation.description: Determines maximum active power.

paramInformation.label: LED frame – colour when ON
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines the LED colour when the device is ON.

paramInformation.label: LED frame – colour when OFF
paramInformation.description: This parameter defines the LED colour when the device is OFF.

paramInformation.label: LED frame – brightness
paramInformation.description: This parameter allows to adjust the LED frame brightness.

paramInformation.label: Buttons orientation
paramInformation.description: This parameter allows reversing the operation of the buttons.

paramInformation.label: Alarm configuration - 1st slot
paramInformation.description: determines to which alarm frames and how the device should react

paramInformation.description: determines to which alarm frames and how the device should react

paramInformation.description: determines to which alarm frames and how the device should react

paramInformation.description: determines to which alarm frames and how the device should react

paramInformation.label: Alarm configuration - 5th slot
paramInformation.description: determines to which alarm frames and how the device should react

paramInformation.label: Alarm configuration – duration
paramInformation.description: defines duration of alarm sequence

paramInformation.label: First button – scenes sent
paramInformation.description: determines which actions result in sending scene IDs

paramInformation.label: Second button – scenes sent
paramInformation.description: determines which actions result in sending scene IDs

paramInformation.label: Power reports – include self-consumption
paramInformation.description: determines whether the power measurements should include self-consumption

paramInformation.label: Power reports – on change
paramInformation.description: defines minimal change to be reported

paramInformation.label: Power reports – periodic
paramInformation.description: defines reporting interval for measured power

paramInformation.label: Energy reports – on change
paramInformation.description: defines minimal change to be reported

paramInformation.label: Energy reports – periodic
paramInformation.description: defines reporting interval for measured energy

paramInformation.description: Minimum brightness level - initialised at calibration

paramInformation.description: Maximum brightness level - initalised at calibration

2nd button OFF value sent to association groups
